ITEM.TITLE: Issue 92
ITEM.DESC: Your Raspberry Pi problems solved in the latest edition of The MagPi. Plus! Track local weather and pollution, add facial recognition to a magic mirror, and tweet with a hacked Morse code key.

ITEM.TITLE: Issue 91
ITEM.DESC: Get involved with #MonthOfMaking in The MagPi magazine issue 91. Plus! Eben Upton talks to us about the new entry-level Raspberry Pi 4 with 2GB RAM.

ITEM.TITLE: Issue 90
ITEM.DESC: Get your free Raspberry Pi 4 Stand with the print edition of The MagPi issue #90. Plus! How to overclock Raspberry Pi 4 and the best cooling cases tested!

ITEM.TITLE: Issue 89
ITEM.DESC: Discover the best Raspberry Pi tips, tools, kits and gadgets in the latest edition of The MagPi magazine.

ITEM.TITLE: Issue 88
ITEM.DESC: Rediscover retro computing and thermal-testing the new firmware. All in the latest edition of The MagPi magazine.

ITEM.TITLE: Issue 87
ITEM.DESC: Build a Raspberry Pi 4K Digital Media Hub with our feature-packed tutorial in the latest issue of The MagPi magazine. It’s the ideal practical project that makes superb use of the new power found in Raspberry Pi 4.

ITEM.TITLE: Issue 86
ITEM.DESC: Inside the latest issue of The MagPi you’ll find 25 Powerful Raspberry Pi projects that really show what our favourite computer is capable of. You’ll learn to make autonomous yachts, AI sorting machines, radical robots, medical projects, space rovers, football bots, and more.

ITEM.TITLE: Issue 85
ITEM.DESC: Can you do everything with a $55 computer? We’ve been pretty confident about using Raspberry Pi 4 with 4GB RAM as our main desktop PC. This month we put it to the test, by getting one of our best makers to use nothing but Raspberry Pi 4 for a week. And report back the results!

ITEM.TITLE: Issue 84
ITEM.DESC: Get your Raspberry Pi 4 Starter Guide in The MagPi magazine issue #84.

ITEM.TITLE: Issue 83
ITEM.DESC: Introducing Raspberry Pi 4.

ITEM.TITLE: Issue 82
ITEM.DESC: Learn to code with Scratch and Python in this month’s edition of The MagPi.

ITEM.TITLE: Issue 81
ITEM.DESC: Build a Raspberry Pi project in this month’s edition of The MagPi.

ITEM.TITLE: Issue 80
ITEM.DESC: Discover the 50 best Raspberry Pi tips in this month’s edition of The MagPi.
